channel.title: Rate my new buisiness site
channel.description:
Hi, we'll i heard there was good money to be made by running a gambling website. So I'm starting up my own charity :)
I know it probobally doesn't make much sense, but it's easier than following the gambling laws.
Anyway, rate good or abuse it hard I want to know your opinions. I have uploaded a temporary version and disabled the play page.
If anyone tries to hack it and tell me they got in somehow I will them and give them a reward.
The website is fully functional feel free to sign up but it wont be relleased till next year once I get my permit and all the information will be reset.
[url=http://chrishemmens.net/easylotto/]http://chrishemmens.net/easylotto[/url]
PS. I'd be greatfull if anyone could get a screenshot of it in ie5,6 and older versions of FireFox.

item.title: Rate my new buisiness site
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

20% is negligible to me, that may seem a bit harsh, but I don’t think that 20 percent will be looking for me to design a website for them. Anyways, i’ve corrected the FAQ page for you, ive attached it below, word document.

Read full topic

the rollover on the home and other buttons are kinda cheesy, and not that cool but they work. I kinda like the layout too. GJ

item.title: Rate my new buisiness site

item.description:

EDIT: I read through the FAQ, and found many spelling errors, I suggest you go through it again. Also, would you mind if I tested the security of the website, even though I’m from the US?[/quote]

LOL.

Procedure Tutorial:

Step 1:
Open MS Words

Step 2:
Copy

Step 3:
Paste

Step 4:
Look for red lines

Step 5:
correct them

step 6:
copy

step 7:
paste to site

step 8:
have a happy lawl
